body.p:
Washington D.C
Aug 30th 1862
Gov Robinson
Dear Sir

The twelve months recruits of Ky will be allowed the twenty five dollars Bounty and advance pay & instruction will be given the disbursing officer accordingly, yielding to the peculiar exigenices in your state I shall also authorize ordinance stores to be issued on requisitions of state authorities by Capt Edson but request that care be taken to avoid double issues, also to see that the arms issued are properly disposed of, the disposition of this department is to afford you every possible aid
